name: Aliens: Neoplasma
overview: Help lieutenant Ashley to beat the greedy corporation, space beasts and the crazy computer! Don’t let aliens reach the earth! Long pre55 the "Grenade" button to throw grenades further. Press "Down+jump" to jump off boxes. Beware of doors controlled by the mad computer and try to trap facehuggers under them. Interact with blinking objects by pressing the "Up" button. You can stop fans for a while by throwing grenades into them.
